Text:
This package was made by me with files from other uploaders. I was having issues with the game, and with this i managed to run perfectly on Windows 8 64bits after a few adjustments.

This package also contains an expansion pack called Forgotten Empires. It's a fan made expansion that adds Widescreen and new civilizations and units. More information here: http://www.forgottenempires.net/
It can be downloaded for free, but i forgot to take it off of this torrent anyway.
This package ALSO contains AoE2Wide, who add widescreen resolution to The Conquerors expansion multiplayer, and a bunch of random maps. God, i wish i could edit torrents.
